about_the_game:
Bullet-hell shooter with RPG-like elements such as exploration, growth and reinforcement.

【Game flow】

Each stage is divided into several areas, and players can attack any area they like.

The player can use the experience gained in the process, the materials collected and the money to level up and strengthen their weapons,

The aim is to defeat the stage bosses while using the experience gained in the process, collected materials and money to level up, strengthen weapons and purchase new weapons and skills, etc.

【Game features】

The damage system is based on HP rather than a residual unit system, so it is possible to reduce damage by leveling up and strengthening the system.

Damage can be suppressed by improving your level and strengthening. Because of the earning system that uses enemy bullets, you can enjoy the earning play without worrying about being hit by bullets.

You can enjoy a bold earning play without worrying about being hit by bullets.

【Score system】

The Absorption, which can be activated by accumulating a gauge, is an important system for both earning money and Safe standing, as it can convert all of the bullets of an enemy into Gems when you kill them.

It is an important system for both earning money and safe positioning.

The more you earn, the more you can level up and strengthen your character, so don't be afraid of enemy bullets and attack aggressively.

name: Divine Orders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4300U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The Abyss has begun to undermine the Divine Tree and interfere with the reason of the world... this is exploration-style shooting RPG. In each area, the situation changes, and you have to earn experience scores, acquire materials, level up and strengthen your weapons, and challenge the bosses
